props.name: isRefreshing
props.description: If the client is currently reauthenticating

methods.name: authenticate
methods.description: Start the authentification process

methods.name: refreshToken
methods.description: Checks if a token refresh is needed and calls Auth.reauthenticate if needed

params.name: forceVerify
params.description: if the /verify endpoint should be requested

methods.name: reauthenticate
methods.description: Refreshes the auth data

methods.name: deviceAuthAuthenticate
methods.description: Authenticate with device auth

methods.name: exchangeCodeAuthenticate
methods.description: Authenticate with an exchange code

params.name: token
params.description: which client secret to use (default to ios)

methods.name: authorizationCodeAuthenticate
methods.description: Authenticate with an authorization code

methods.name: refreshTokenAuthenticate
methods.description: Authenticate with a refresh token

methods.name: getOauthToken
methods.description: Obtain a token

methods.name: generateDeviceAuth
methods.description: Generate a device auth

methods.name: acceptEULA
methods.description: Check if the EULA needs to be accepted and accepts it if needed

params.name: args
params.description: client options like `auth`options or `debug`options. Can be modified in client.config

props.name: lastMemberMeta
props.description: Used to store outfit, etc of the client even if he switches parties

props.name: party
props.description: The party the client is in

props.name: friends
props.description: Clients cached friends (updated with xmpp events)

props.name: pendingFriends
props.description: Clients cached pending friends (updated with xmpp events)

props.name: blockedFriends
props.description: Clients cached blocked friends (updated with xmpp events)

props.name: partyLock
props.description: Delays all party-related xmpp events while the client makes changes to client.party

props.name: reauthLock
props.description: Delays all requests while Auth.reauthenticate is called

props.name: makeCamelCase
props.description: Convert an objects keys to camel case

props.name: authData
props.description: Auth data if you want to do requests to epic yourself. In most cases you wont need this

methods.name: parseError
methods.description: Parse an error that could be an object or a string

methods.name: login
methods.description: Connect the client to epicgames servers. Make sure to provide a valid login method first!

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Disconnect the client. Kills all tokens, disconnects the xmpp client and leaves the clients party

methods.name: restart
methods.description: Restarts the entire client

methods.name: updateCache
methods.description:
Refreshes client.friends, client.blockedFriends and client.pendingFriends
Normally theres `no need to use this function` as the client refreshes the cache with xmpp events

methods.name: debug
methods.description: Debug a message via client.config.debug if available

methods.name: waitForEvent
methods.description: Wait for a client event

params.name: timeout
params.description: timeout in ms to throw an error

params.name: filter
params.description: function to apply on the returned event

methods.name: waitUntilReady
methods.description: Wait for the client to get ready

params.name: timeout
params.description: time in ms to wait before rejecting the promise

methods.name: getProfile
methods.description: Fetch an epicgames profile

params.name: query
params.description: id, name or email of the profile to lookup (can be a string or array)

returns.description: the looked up users (undefined if a lookup fails)

methods.name: setStatus
methods.description: Change the friendlist status of the client

params.name: status
params.description: Status to display, empty to reset it

params.name: to
params.description: user to send the status to | empty for entire friendlist

methods.name: addFriend
methods.description: Add a user as a friend or accept a friend request

params.name: user
params.description: id, name or email of the user to friend / accept

methods.name: removeFriend
methods.description: Remove a friend or decline a friend request

params.name: user
params.description: id, name or email of the user to unfriend / decline

methods.name: blockFriend
methods.description: Block a friend

params.name: friend
params.description: id, name or email of the friend to block

methods.name: unblockFriend
methods.description: Unblock a friend

params.name: friend
params.description: id, name or email of the friend to block

methods.name: sendFriendMessage
methods.description: Send a message to a friend

params.name: friend
params.description: id or name of the friend to message

methods.name: invite
methods.description: Send party invitation to a friend

params.name: friend
params.description: id or name of the friend

methods.name: getNews
methods.description: Fetch news for a gamemode

params.name: mode
params.description: gamemode to fetch the news for

params.name: language
params.description: language to fetch the news in

methods.name: getBrStats
methods.description: Fetch v2 stats for one/multiple player(s)

params.name: startTime
params.description: epoch to start fetching stats (empty for lifetime)

params.name: endTime
params.description: epoch to stop fetching stats (empty for lifetime)

methods.name: getCreatorCode
methods.description: Lookup a creator code

params.name: showSimilar
params.description: if an array with similar codes should be returned

returns.description: the code or an array of similar ones

methods.name: getBrStore
methods.description: Fetch the current battle royale store

params.name: language
params.description: language to fetch the news in

methods.description: Convert an objects keys to camel case

methods.name: consoleQuestion
methods.description: Display a console prompt that resolves in a promise awaiting for an answer

props.name: currentlyPatching
props.description:
If the client member is currently sending a patch.
Needed for revision

props.name: patchQueue
props.description:
Queue to push patches into while currentlyPatching is true
Needed for revision

props.description: The asset and id of this members pickaxe

props.description: The asset and id of this members emote

props.description: If this member is leader of the party

methods.description:
Set client readiness in party. NOTE: This is visually.
Matchmaking is a completely different thing

methods.name: setBattlepass
methods.description: Set the battlepass info of the client in party

methods.description: Set the clients banner in party

methods.name: setOutfit
methods.description: Set the clients outfit in party

methods.name: setBackpack
methods.description: Set the clients backpack in party

methods.name: setPickaxe
methods.description: Set the clients pickaxe in party

methods.name: setEmote
methods.description: Set the clients emote in party

methods.name: clearEmote
methods.description: Clears the clients emote in party

props.name: name
props.description: First name of the client user

props.name: lastName
props.description: Last name of the client user

props.name: failedLoginAttempts
props.description: Number of failed login attempts of the client user

props.name: lastLogin
props.description: The last time somebody logged into the clients account

props.name: numberOfDisplayNameChanges
props.description: Number of the client users display name changes

props.name: ageGroup
props.description: Age group of the client user

props.name: headless
props.description: If the account has no displayName due to `no epicgames account being linked`

props.name: preferredLanguage
props.description: Preferred language of the client user

props.name: canUpdateDisplayName
props.description: If the client user can update its display name

props.name: tfaEnabled
props.description: If a Two-Factor-Authentification method is enabled for the client users account

props.name: emailVerified
props.description: If the client users email is verified (now required when creating accounts)

props.name: minorVerified
props.description: If the account has been verified to be run by a minor

props.name: minorExpected
props.description: If the account is expected to be run by a minor

props.name: minorStatus
props.description: The minor status of this account.

props.name: mutualFriends
props.description: How many mutual friends the client has with this friend

props.name: favorite
props.description: If the client favorited this friend

props.name: createdAt
props.description: When the friendship with this friend was created

props.name: note
props.description: The note the client set for this friend

props.name: alias
props.description: The alias the client set for this friend

props.name: isOnline
props.description:
Fetches if a user is online.
This **can be inaccurate** as it uses the recievedAt of the last presence

props.name: isJoinable
props.description:
If the client can join this friends party.
This may be slighly inaccurate as it uses presence

methods.description: Block this friend

methods.description: Unblock this friend

methods.description: Join this friends party (please check if this friend isJoinable first)

params.description: id of friend that sent this presence

props.name: status
props.description: The friends status eg "Battle Royale Lobby - 1 / 16"

props.description: If the friend is in kairos (fortnite mobile)

props.name: hasVoiceSupport
props.description: If the friend has voice support

props.name: sessionId
props.description: The id of the game session the friend is currently in

props.name: homebaseRating
props.description: The rating of the friends SaveTheWorld homebase

props.name: subGame
props.description: The subgame the friend is in

props.name: isInUnjoinableMatch
props.description: If the friend is in an unjoinable match

props.name: playlist
props.description: The current playlist the friend has selected

props.name: partySize
props.description: How many members the friends party has

props.name: partyMaxSize
props.description: How many max members the friends party has

props.description: How many max members the friends party has

props.name: gameplayStats
props.description: Stats of the game the client is currently in

props.description: Data of the party this friend is currently in

props.description: Date when this party was created

props.description: If the party is currently sending a patch

classes.name: List
classes.description:
A Map used mainly for cached values throughout fnbr.js but with some extra functions.
Inspired by the simplicity of discord.js's collections.

methods.name: get
methods.description:
Finds a key in the List and returns its value
https://developer.mozilla.org/en/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Map/get

methods.name: set
methods.description:
Maps a key to a value
https://developer.mozilla.org/en/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Map/set

methods.name: delete
methods.description:
Finds a key and delets the key-value-pair
https://developer.mozilla.org/en/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Map/delete

params.name: key
params.description: key of the pair to delete

methods.name: clear
methods.description:
Clears the entire list
https://developer.mozilla.org/en/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Map/clear

methods.name: toArray
methods.description: Returns a list of all key-value-pairs

methods.name: find
methods.description: Finds a value with a function

methods.name: filter
methods.description: Filter this list

methods.name: has
methods.description:
Checks if list has a key
https://developer.mozilla.org/en/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Map/has

methods.name: some
methods.description: Checks if list has a value using a function

methods.name: map
methods.description: Maps this list (like Array.map)
